# Main

## Fabio Setti {#title}

### PhD student in Psychometrics and Quantitative Psychology at Fordham University

I am enrolled in the Psychometrics and Quantitative Psychology (PQP) PhD program at Fordham University. I love doing both applied and methodological research! I mainly focus on **psychometric measurement** and the implementation of **appropriate statistical** **methods** in the **field of psychology**.
